data.message: I'm pretty upset. I got married yesterday and want to change my name on here and it won't let me and there isn't any options to contact any type of support for anything like that. If you could help me, Facebook, I would really appreciate it. I don't want to have to make a new account or stick with this name. Patiently waiting for a reply!

replies.message: Hi Bre. Have you tried these steps to change your name?: http://on.fb.me/1Rysc6B. Hope this helps! -Rey
